extendedInfo.description: Brosix is a cross-platform Instant Messaging and collaboration tool, ideal for everyday communication for business and leisure.** IMPORTANT NOTE **Users of Brosix Personal (FREE version), please use 1 for network number when asked. Other users, please consult your network administrator for the proper network number.Features include:- Text Chat- Offline Messages- Send pictures and photos- No Advertisements displayed- Strong Encryption on all communication channels- Call contacts - if a contact filled in his phone number (work, mobile or home) you can make a regular phone call right from Brosix contacts list using your cell phone plan minutes.- Geo-location - you can send your position to another user- Multiple languages - English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and BulgarianBrosix also works on iPhone, Windows, Mac and Linux providing many exciting features.Brosix is similar to Skype, Yahoo, Messenger, ICQ, AIM. Brosix encrypts all communication channels and provides additional tools to improve user experience.Brosix Awards: http://www.brosix.com/awards/Best Business IM 2012Second in "Best Mac IM for 2012"Second in "Best Android IM of 2012"Best Business IM 2011Best IM Feature 2011 for Brosix Screen SharingSecond in "Best IM for Mac 2011"Best IM Feature 2010 for Brosix ScreenshotBest IM Feature 2009 for Brosix WhiteboardIM Developers of the Year 2009Second in "Most Improved IM Client 2009"In top three in "Best IM Client 2009"In top three in "Best Third-Party IM Client 2009"âª Learn more at http://www.brosix.comâª Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/brosixâª Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/brosixâª Need Help? Visit http://www.brosix.com/support/

reviews.title: Great Work App
reviews.comment: I was not an initial fan of this, but it is a fantastic tool for when we are in the field and need contact others. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Robert Koepke

reviews.title: User registration is forbidden
reviews.comment: User registration is forbidden for this network, nice, 10x.
reviews.author: Doncho Gunchev

reviews.title: Great Secure IM
reviews.comment: This is easily the best IM program and fully cross platform. Android, iPhone, Windows, Linux, Mac and Web based clients are all available. On some of them you need a network number (Use 1 for the free network otherwise it will seem like you can\'t register) but once you are in you have full IM capabilities including text, voice and camera... all encrypted.
reviews.author: Jayden Beresford

reviews.title: Something amiss
reviews.comment: All of a sudden there ideas an issue. Log on and it will show other users but they all ghosting cause no one is actually there neither can we chat just frozen.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Messaging Program Ever!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the desktop version of this program for quite awhile. It\'s an easy-to-use, fully-functional, SECURE instant messenger. I\'m glad they finally made an Android app for this! Brosix IM is generally designed to be used on private corporate networks, however, anyone can use it for free (see my note below regarding \"Network Number\"). Great job Brosix! NOTE FOR NEW USERS: Enter \"1\" for your \"Network Number.
reviews.author: A Google User
